attributes.title: Horrific experience

attributes.title: #creepytrump

attributes.title: Very poor app. Hereâ€™s something else to do.
attributes.review: The FitnessGram Pacer Test is a multistage aerobic capacity test that progressively gets more difficult as it continues. The 20 meter pacer test will begin in 30 seconds. Line up at the start. The running speed starts slowly but gets faster each minute after you hear this signal bodeboop. A sing lap should be completed every time you hear this sound. ding Remember to run in a straight line and run as long as possible. The second time you fail to complete a lap before the sound, your test is over. The test will begin on the word start. On your mark. Get ready!â€¦ Start.

attributes.title: Donald J(enius) Trump needs to work on his app
attributes.review: This app is absolutely horrible! I love my President, Donald J(enius) Trump, but this app is a curse. When I (a devoted American Patriot and supporter of Donald J(enius) Trump) downloaded this app, my cat immediately threw up and then died. I was confused but decided to continue to go onto the app in support of my lovely President Donald J(enius) Trump, my house blew up and all of my possessions flew into other peoples yards (only ones with Donald J(enius) Trump yard signs) and the people stole my stuff! I thought it might be over and in support of the great Donald J(enius) Trump, I scrolled through the app. My phone electrocuted me and now I am paralyzed.  My grandma is writing this for me. Please fix this Bug Donald J(enius) Trump

attributes.title: Iâ€™m baffled/confused
attributes.review: I opened the app and I was immediately routed to a map of local golf courses and fast food hamberder joints. The second time I opened it, I heard voices whispering â€œalternative factsâ€ from my microwave. I got scared. I closed the app. So... third time was the charm. Upon opening it, I was told thru my phoneâ€™s speaker how beautiful my white skin is, how I should fear brown people, how Iâ€™m so rich (even tho Iâ€™m not), how the news is fake, how I need to fear everyone and everything... and to only believe the words out of Hitlerâ€˜s,  I mean,  trumps mouth.  Weird thing tho... after using the app I had Cheeto dust on my fingers and the taste of desperation in my mouth.

attributes.title: Worst app Iâ€™ve ever gotten
attributes.review: This app took 6 days to download and after finally showing up on my phone I couldnâ€™t even click on the app. I tried multiple times to open the app and after the 3rd attempt my phone started smoking and burning my hands. I immediately tried to delete this app but my phone screen cracked and died. I had to buy another phone and then I found out that this app charged me $48 despite me being unable to open the app. I would definitely not recommend getting this app because it can burn your phone and I have seen it cause much more permanent damage.
